intro: Reevesia orbicularis, commonly known as the orbicular reevesia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Araceae family, characterized by its distinctive inflorescence consisting of a spadix surrounded by a spathe. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically green or yellow in color. Reevesia orbicularis thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Its ornamental value lies in its unique foliage and striking floral structure.
